sentences.sContent: He shoved her towards the car.
Everyone was pushing and shoving to see the prince.
sentences.sCn: 大家都推着挤着要看王子。

remMethod.val: 相爱(love)的两个人任你怎么推(shove)也推不开

trans.tranCn: 乱推， 挤， 用力推；乱塞， 随意放
trans.tranOther: to push someone or something in a rough or careless way, using your hands or shoulders
